english.instructionsText: Text("\text{Move the coins into the boxes. \\\\Press k to " + (If(showKeyboardInstructions, "hide", "show")) + " keyboard instructions. \\\\Press x to restart the tab cycle.}", (0, 0), false, true)
english.AAppletStatus: "" + (If(time ≟ 0, "2 pennies, 1 nickel, 1 dime and 1 quarter and a box for each type of coin. The time will start once a coin is selected.", time ≟ maxTime, "A penny box, a nickel box, a dime box and a quarter box. The time has stopped. " + (coinCount " ") + (If(coinCount ≟ 1, "coin was", "coins were") " correctly sorted."), "The time is running. Navigate to the coins to sort them.")) + " " + escText + ""
english.Dime1CaptionText: dime. Press D to move the coin into the dime box.
english.Penny1CaptionText: penny. Press P to move the coin into the penny box.
english.Nickel1CaptionText: nickel. Press N to move the coin into the nickel box.
english.Penny2CaptionText: penny. Press P to move the coin into the penny box.
english.Quarter1CaptionText: quarter. Press Q to move the coin into the quarter box.

spanish.AAppletStatus: "" + (If(time ≟ 0, "2 pennies, 1 nickel, 1 dime and 1 quarter and a box for each type of coin. The time will start once a coin is selected.", time ≟ maxTime, "A penny box, a nickel box, a dime box and a quarter box. The time has stopped. " + (coinCount " ") + (If(coinCount ≟ 1, "coin was", "coins were") " correctly sorted."), "The time is running. Navigate to the coins to sort them.")) + " " + escText + ""
